titleStmt.title: A speech delivered to His Majesty in the name of the French Church at the Savoy containing their humble thanks for His Majesty declaration in favor of those of the French nation, residing within his dominions / by A Lombard ...
Declaration against the French
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II).
Lombard, A.

notesStmt.note: This declaration (see Steele 3455) contains the declaration of Charles II against the French King for the French King's declaration of war on Jan. 26. It also states that French and Dutch subjects in England will be safe and that exiles will be protected and welcomed.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
